::Lavatron::

Lavatron takes a few steps back, nearly falling over from the blade.
He lifts his hand, firing off two bolts at Surgital to get him back so
Lavatron could fully regain balance.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Surgital::
> 
>     Surgital felt a painful surge of electricty run through his arm
and all over his body.  He backed away from Lavatron, yelling in pain.
> 
>     "AARRGHH!!!" Surgital yelled, then shook off the pain, "The
Surgeon is in!  Time to go to the pit!" 
> 
>      Surgital's right hand converted into a spinning blade.  He
swung it at Lavatron's neck.
